text: Loïc Bouvard (20 January 1929 – 27 November 2017) was a French politician. He was born in Tours, Indre-et-Loire. Bouvard was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Morbihan department, and was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. Bouvard died on 27 November 2017 at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Centre-Val de Loire Category:People from Tours
title: Loïc Bouvard
